item.title: Amend 5 to license R-110,revises license condition 2.B.(2) to increase possession limit from 700 grams to 995 grams of low enriched U-235.
item.description: OPERATING LICENSES & AMENDMENTS, TEXT-LICENSE APPLICATIONS & PERMITS
item.author: NRC/NRR

item.title: Safety evaluation supporting amend 5 to license R-110.

item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Notice of violation from insp on 911209-12.Violations noted: failure to administer annual written exam to two SROs in 1990 & failure to conduct drill of ISU emergency plan during 1990.
item.description: NOTICE OF VIOLATION OF A REGULATION, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)

item.title: Insp rept 50-284/91-01 on 911209-12.Violations noted.Major areas inspected:mgt organization,training & qualifications, reactor operations & maint,emergency preparedness,physical security & safeguards & SNM accountability.
item.description: INSPECTION REPORT, NRC-GENERATED, TEXT-INSPECTION & AUDIT & I&E CIRCULARS
